amendment.description: Amendment clarifies the provisions of the bill to allow the participation of the Department of Energy's national laboratories in the hydrogen research and development program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of a technical amendment to clarify the provisions of the bill relating to the participation of the Department of Energy's national laboratories in the hydrogen research and development program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (CA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
